name: Dark Run Escape
description:
General:

2 players are stuck in a warehouss and have a knife, compass, flashlight, can camouflage and plant explosive traps. First player to escape, wins.

Details:

You need to find the key and use it to activate all the batteries around the map. After all the batteries are activated, get to the elevator to win. At the moment the matchmaker finds 2 random opponents online and makes them fight one another. An option to play with a friend will be added in the future.

Also, the positions of the batteries are randomly generated as well.

There is 1 map avaible for play in this development build, but at release there will be more, 3 are already in development.

Link to greenlight: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=797563222
